\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{eolgrab}
\newcommand*{\Begin}{\eolgrab   \begin}
\newcommand*{\End  }{\eolgrab   \end  }
\newcommand*{\Item }{\eolgrabopt\item }
\Begin document
  \Begin itemize
    \Item
      first item
    \Item
      second item
  \End itemize
  \Begin description
    \Item foo
      is the first syllable of foobar.
    \Item bar
      is the second syllable of foobar.
  \End description
\End document
